name: Quantum Flux
description: Quantum Flux is an old school style rogue-like following the Artemis. A prototype vessel aiming to save humanity from destruction, to do so it must find a way through a difficult and hostile universe to create a new home for the human race.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.66 Ghz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is more like Choose Your Own Adventure than FTL. I played it a few times and found that with Advance Scanner it was easy to get the positive outcomes from most encounters. But once you know how to respond to each encounter it's very much the same. There doesn't seem to be any depth or replay value. Not recommended even on sale.
